content: mini hot dog cat toy crochet pattern written by melissa trenado this cute little hot dog measures about 3 inches in length and 1 1/2 inches long you will need ● size d hook 3 25mm ● light brown yarn ● soft white yarn ● burgundy yarn ● stuffing ● cat nip optional ● yarn needle ● red or yellow yarn optional for sauce stitches and abbreviations used… ● chain ­ chain ● sl ­ slip_stitch ● single_crochet ­ single_crochet ● st ­ stitch ● sts ­ stitches ● repeat ­ repeat ● increase ­ increase 2 single_crochet in the same space ● decrease ­ decrease or decrease single_crochet 2 together outside of the bun make 2 ● with light brown yarn round 1~ chain 11 single_crochet in the 2nd chain from the hook single_crochet in the next 8 sts 3 single_crochet in the last st 12 single_crochet ​ now you will need to single_crochet along the backside of the foundation chain single_crochet in the next 8 sts 3 single_crochet in the last 23 single_crochet around round 2~ increase in the first st single_crochet in the next 8 sts increase in next single_crochet increase in next single_crochet in the next 8 sts increase ​ in next single_crochet in last 2 27 single_crochet around round 3~ increase in the first st single_crochet in the next 9 sts increase in next single_crochet in the next 2 increase in the next single_crochet in ​ the next 10 sts increase in next single_crochet in the last 2 31 single_crochet around round 4~ single_crochet around 31 single_crochet around ​ ● sl in next st ● fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing inside of bun make 2 ● with white yarn repeat rnds 1­3 of the outside of the bun ● sl in next st ● fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing using the brown yarn tail whip stitch a brown and white piece of the bun together repeat for the other side of the bun before sewing closed add stuffing and catnip if desired then sew the two sides of the bun together about half way using brown yarn hot dog ● with burgandy yarn ● stuff lightly as you crochet along round 1~ 6 single_crochet into magic_ring ​ round 2~ single_crochet in next 2 increase / repeat 8 single_crochet ​ round 3­11~ single_crochet around 8sc ​ round 12~ decrease around 4sc ​ ● fasten_off leaving a tail for sewing ● with your yarn needle sew hole closed sew hot dog into bun if desired optional for sauce ­ with desired color red for ketchup yellow for mustard etc leaving a long beginning tail chain 12 single_crochet in the 2nd chain from the hook and in each remaining chain fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing with your yarn needle sew across the top of the hot dog i hope you enjoyed this crochet pattern if you have any questions feel free to contact me at any time please do not claim this
